Arizona Winter School 1998
Schedule

Unless otherwise noted, all activities will take place in Room 102 of the Center for English as a Second Language (CESL).

Friday, March 13

8:00-10:00 pm
Informal gathering (Olmec Room, Clarion Santa Rita Hotel)

Saturday, March 14

8:00-8:30
Registration, coffee

D. W. Masser, Universität Basel: "ABC - diophantine approximation aspects" -- Part I

Refreshments

Alexandru Buium, University of New Mexico: "Differential algebras and Diophantine geometry" -- Part I

Lunch

Refreshments

Q and A session (at Bill McCallum's house)
